alert.note: Alert for Christian; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 1:55AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Christian and southeastern Trigg Counties through 145 AM CST... At 1254 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Canton, or 12 miles southwest of Cadiz, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hopkinsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 71 and 81. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
